### Data Camp
The fifth [Data Camp](https://www.datacamp.com/){target="_blank"} module is due **two Wednesdays** following the completion of the Week 5 class. The module covers types of data sampling, and experiments. In particular, the sections are:

- Language of data
- Study types and cautionary tales 
- Sampling strategies and experimental design
- Case study
